item.title: China Returns Strict Covid Restrictions to Fight New Outbreak...
item.description:
www.msn.com
BEIJING — Neighborhoods under strict lockdown. Thousands quarantined. Millions tested in mere days. Overseas arrivals locked up for weeks and sometimes months. China has followed variations of that formula for dealing with the coronavirus for more than a year — and a new outbreak suggests that they could be part of Chinese life for some time to come. China appeared to get the coronavirus under control nearly a year ago. But hundreds of millions...

item.title: 'All-in' Buddhist practice combines meditation and martial arts...
item.description:
apnews.com
(RNS) — In all Zen traditions, meditation is the backbone of the practice. Students sit with a tall spine, hands loosely interlocked and eyes half-closed. At Chosei Zen in Madison, Wisconsin, though, new students are never quite prepared for the rigor of Rinzai Zen, which asks participants to remain motionless for up to 45 minutes — twice a day.
